amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for HOPWA by $3 million bringing it back to the FY 10 funding level of $335 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for the Community Planning and Development by $3 million and reduce funding for Information Technology Fund by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A033) offered by Mr. Nadler.
